import axios from'axios';import config from'../config/environment';// Create axios instance for board members API
const apiClient=axios.create({baseURL:config.backendUrl,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Add request interceptor to include JWT token
apiClient.interceptors.request.use(request=>{var _request$method;const token=localStorage.getItem('authToken');if(token){request.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}console.log("[API] ".concat((_request$method=request.method)===null||_request$method===void 0?void 0:_request$method.toUpperCase()," ").concat(request.url),request.data);return request;},error=>Promise.reject(error));// Add response interceptor to handle errors
apiClient.interceptors.response.use(response=>{console.log("[API Response] ".concat(response.status),response.data);return response;},error=>{var _error$response,_error$response2,_error$response3;console.error("[API Error] ".concat(error.message),(_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.status,(_error$response2=error.response)===null||_error$response2===void 0?void 0:_error$response2.data);if(((_error$response3=error.response)===null||_error$response3===void 0?void 0:_error$response3.status)===401){localStorage.removeItem('authToken');window.location.href='/login';}return Promise.reject(error);});// Board Members API
export const boardMembersAPI={// Get all board members
getAll:()=>apiClient.get('/api/board-members'),// Get members by department
getByDepartment:department=>apiClient.get("/api/board-members/department/".concat(department)),// Get single member
getById:id=>apiClient.get("/api/board-members/".concat(id)),// Create member (admin only)
create:data=>apiClient.post('/api/board-members',data),// Update member (admin only)
update:(id,data)=>apiClient.put("/api/board-members/".concat(id),data),// Delete member (admin only)
delete:id=>apiClient.delete("/api/board-members/".concat(id))};export default apiClient;
